\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	M \& {\varepsilon _2} \& {\varepsilon _3} \& \varepsilon \\
	M \& {(\varepsilon _2)_F} \& {C'} \& {\varepsilon'} \\
	\& {(\varepsilon _2)_C} \& {(\varepsilon _2)_C} \&\& \varepsilon
	\arrow[hook, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["q", hook', from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[dashed, hook', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["q", hook', from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\simeq", curve={height=-12pt}, dashed, from=1-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[dashed, hook, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\exists s}"', dashed, from=2-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
